name: read-s3_update-dynamo
description: reads ontology from s3 and updates dynamodb

scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name readS3UpdateDynamo --handler readS3UpdateDynamo.handler --memory-size 128 --runtime nodejs6.10 --role arn:aws:iam::309837773135:role/lambda-s3-execution-role --timeout 3 --publish --zip-file fileb://Lambda-Deployment.zip

author: dado
